description: Introduction to modern photonics for applications in optical communications, data storage, optical computing & optical sensing. After completing the course, students will have the understanding of operation & limitations of enabling photonic technologies & gain the ability to analyse & simulate photonic devices & systems using analytical & numerical methods.
prerequisites:
For COMS4103: prereqs ELEC3100
For COMS7400: prereqs ELEC7101
incompatible:
For COMS4103: inc COMS7400
For COMS7400: inc COMS4103
